name: NOVAST – furniture e-commerce platform
shortDescription: Just built NOVAST – a modern furniture e-commerce platform with full customer & admin dashboards.
longDescription: NOVAST is a modern furniture e-commerce platform designed with two primary roles: Customer and Admin. The system provides a smooth shopping experience for customers while giving admins powerful management tools.
features: User authentication and authorization
Shopping cart and checkout process
Customer dashboard to track orders & manage account
Admin dashboard for product management
Order tracking and history
Responsive design for all devices
Sales insights with 3-month sales forecasting

name: Novalink Computers – computer e-commerce platform
shortDescription: Just built Novalink Computers – a modern computer e-commerce platform with full customer & admin dashboards, including Build My PC and chatbot features.
longDescription: Novalink Computers is a professional e-commerce solution designed for tech enthusiasts, combining shopping, customization, and smart assistance in one platform.
features: Browse computer products with detailed specifications and images
Build My PC – customize computer components with live pricing
Smart chatbot to guide customers and answer FAQs
Add to cart, checkout, and track orders
Customer account and dashboard management
Admin product, order, customer, blog management and sales analytics

name: Planora – Smart Event Management Platform
shortDescription: Planora is a modern event management tool where organizers can create and manage events, while participants can explore and join events through personalized dashboards.
longDescription: Planora is a professional event management platform built with React, Node.js, and MySQL. It enables organizers to create, manage, and track events, while participants can easily browse, register, and participate. Admins have full control over organizers, participants, and events, ensuring a smooth and secure event ecosystem.
features: Organizer dashboard to create and manage events
Participant dashboard to view and join events
Admin panel to manage organizers, participants, and events
User account management for all roles
Participants can ask questions directly through the platform
AI model to identify participant's favorite categories
Automatic personalized event recommendations
Email service for notifications and updates
Secure authentication and role-based access
Responsive, user-friendly interface

name: SmartCityNow – Clean & Green City Platform
shortDescription: SmartCityNow is a community-driven platform focused on energy saving and clean city initiatives, allowing users to share ideas, events, and report issues on an interactive map.
longDescription: SmartCityNow is a modern web platform built with Vue.js, TailwindCSS, and Node.js, designed to promote clean and sustainable cities. Users can share posts, participate in community events, react and reply to discussions, and raise awareness about energy-saving and environmental initiatives. The platform also provides an interactive map where users can report city issues, view reported issues, and contribute ideas for improvement. Email services keep users updated with event notifications and community activities.
features: Users can add posts about ideas and initiatives
Community events where other users can participate
Reactions and replies on posts for engagement
Interactive map to add and view reported city issues
Users can share and contribute ideas directly on the map
Email service for event updates and notifications
Mobile-responsive and community-friendly interface

name: Achieve360 – Learning & Role Management System
shortDescription: Achieve360 is a complete learning and role management platform with multi-level access for admins, managers, teachers, and students.
longDescription: Achieve360 is a professional education and role management system built with Laravel, TailwindCSS, MySQL, and JavaScript. The platform enables admins to manage users (admins, managers, teachers, and students) with role-based access. Admins can create courses and assign them to teachers, while students can enroll in courses, view course content, check grades, and track attendance. Teachers can update student marks and upload learning materials, while managers can monitor classes and mark attendance using QR code scanning. Achieve360 ensures an organized, transparent, and efficient academic management workflow.
features: Role-based access for Admins, Managers, Teachers, and Students
Admin dashboard to add and manage all user roles
Course creation and assignment to teachers
Student enrollment in courses with access to course content
Teachers can add grades, update marks, and upload course materials
Managers can mark attendance using QR code system
Students can view grades, attendance, and course details
Secure authentication and responsive design

name: Luminova – Smart Event Planning Platform
shortDescription: Luminova is a sleek and responsive event planning platform for organizing, managing, and publishing events with real-time collaboration and automated email notifications.
longDescription: Luminova is a modern event planning platform designed to make event management simple, flexible, and collaborative. With its responsive interface, users can effortlessly plan both personal and professional events—from weddings and private parties to large conferences. The platform supports real-time collaboration, customizable event settings, and event publishing for public visibility. Guests can easily be invited and managed through RSVPs, while integrated email notifications powered by Nodemailer keep everyone updated. Built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, Express.js, and Firebase, Luminova ensures a smooth and engaging experience across devices.
features: Plan and manage personal or professional events (weddings, conferences, parties, etc.)
Real-time collaboration for event planning
Customizable event options and settings
Publish and share events with public visibility options
Event search functionality to discover and filter events
RSVP and guest management system
Automated email notifications with Nodemailer
Responsive design for desktop and mobile

name: Fueltrix – Smart Fuel Management Platform
shortDescription: Fueltrix is a large-scale fuel management system for companies and fuel stations to monitor fuel usage, vehicle status, and automate fuel dispensing using QR codes.
longDescription: Fueltrix is a professional fuel management platform built with React, TailwindCSS, Node.js, Firebase, and Nodemailer. It allows large-scale companies and fuel stations to register on the system, monitor fuel levels, track vehicles, and manage fuel pumps efficiently. Using QR code-based identification, fuel dispensing is automated and secure. Companies can view real-time fuel status, track usage, and ensure proper inventory management. Email notifications keep users updated about fuel levels, transactions, and alerts.
features: Company and fuel station registration
Real-time monitoring of fuel pumps and vehicles
Automated fuel dispensing using QR codes
Fuel status tracking and inventory management
Email notifications for fuel transactions and alerts
Secure authentication and role-based access
Responsive dashboard for companies and fuel stations

name: Ravon – Web & Mobile App Development Company
shortDescription: Ravon is the official website of a leading web and mobile app development company, showcasing services, portfolio, and company information.
longDescription: Ravon is a modern and responsive website built with React and TailwindCSS for a leading web and mobile app development company. The platform highlights the company’s services, portfolio, client testimonials, and contact information. Designed with a clean and professional interface, Ravon ensures a seamless experience for visitors across devices.
features: Responsive website for web and mobile devices
Showcase company services and solutions
Portfolio section to display past projects
Client testimonials and reviews
Contact form for inquiries
Clean and modern design using TailwindCSS
Optimized for performance and usability

name: CommUnity – Community Engagement Platform
shortDescription: CommUnity is a web app connecting people by sharing community opportunities on an interactive map, fostering engagement and volunteering.
longDescription: CommUnity is a powerful platform built with Laravel and MySQL that connects local volunteers with community opportunities. Users can explore nearby initiatives, participate in meaningful volunteer work, and engage with others through a user-friendly interface. The interactive map and geolocation features make it easy to discover and contribute to projects, enhancing community collaboration across Sri Lanka.
features: User-friendly design for easy navigation
Interactive map with geolocation capabilities
Community engagement and volunteer opportunities
Find and participate in local projects
Secure user accounts and role-based access
Responsive design for desktop and mobile devices

name: TeachWave – Online Learning Platform
shortDescription: TeachWave is an online learning platform connecting students and instructors through courses, quizzes, live webinars, and certifications.
longDescription: TeachWave is a comprehensive online learning platform built with React on the frontend, Node.js with Express on the backend, and MongoDB for database management. It enables instructors to upload lecture notes, manage assignments, and conduct quizzes, while students can access course content, submit assignments, participate in quizzes, and earn certificates. The platform also offers live webinars and article reading for a complete educational experience, designed for seamless learning and teaching.
features: User authentication to securely access platform features
Lecture notes management for instructors and students
Assignment submission and tracking
Quizzes with certificate generation upon completion
Access to educational articles and resources
Live webinars for interactive learning
Responsive design for desktop and mobile devices
